title: Project
text:
In this project, the selected players are all the point guards with averages of 25 or more points per game.








































































In conclusion, Luka Doncic is the best point guard in NBA, followed by Kyrie Irving, Ja Morant, and Jalen Brunson(not in any specific order).

title: Data Sources and Models
text: I got the data from statmuse.com and the CRAN R Package NBALoveR. I also used the ggplot2 R Package and the tidyverse R Package to graph my data.

title: Data Sources and Models
text: I got the data from statmuse.com and the CRAN R Package NBALoveR. I also used the ggplot2 R Package and the tidyverse R Package to graph my data.

title: Data Sources and Models
text:
Functions used
The functions I used were tribble() and the geom_col() function, which is similar to a bar graph, except you can specify the y value.

title: About

title: About
text:
About This Project
This projects explores which NBA point guard that scores above 25 points is the best. This project was made for David Kaneâ€™s Free Data Science Bootcamp.
In this project, I collected data about all the point guards who scored 25 or more points per game on average, and graphed the data to find out who is best.

title: NBA point guards dataset
text: There are many good point guards in the NBA, such Luka Doncic, Kyrie Irving, Ja Morant, and Jalen Brunson. I got my data from the NBALoveR package and Statmuse The data was then used to plot the graphs about the players and their stats. Luka Doncic is the best point guard in the NBA.
